title: The Rigd Supply Rambleswing Pro is a Burly but Adaptable Bike Rack Swingout!
content:
The Rigd Supply RambleSwing is one of our favorite rack swingouts, and today, the Orange County, California-based manufacturer announced its new RambleSwing Pro for bike racks and more. Let’s check it out…

RiG’d Supply makes burly hitch-mounted rack systems, and today it announced the launch of the RambleSwing™ Pro, the latest evolution of its category-defining swing-out hitch carrier. Built to fit 2″ receiver cars, vans, SUVs, and trucks, this new platform features:

  • New HitchingPost™ Vertical Arm – A bolt-on accessory arm ready for fuel, water, camp tables, and more—whatever the trip demands.
  • Increased Load Capacity – Now 350 lbs – Designed to handle the heaviest e-bikes and all your buddy’s bikes, with an added 50 lbs of support over the standard model, including 50 lbs more capacity on vertical bike racks.
  • Wider, Full-Size Friendly – Two inches wider to easily accommodate full-size trucks and vans without
    compromising the fitment on mid-size vehicles.

Built to Ramble and Made in the USA

The RambleSwing™ Pro is available now with a 4-6 week ETA with prices starting at $849 Learn more and order today at rigdsupply.com.
